example02.sentence: Not the biggest portions but adequate.

example03.sentence: Green Tea creme brulee is a must!

example06.sentence: The entire staff was extremely accomodating and tended to my every need.

example10.sentence: This is a great place to get a delicious meal.

example15.sentence: Nice ambience, but highly overrated place.

example18.sentence: Our waiter was non-existent and after our food finally arrived over an hour after we ordered, we were not given any water or utensils.

example19.sentence: I complained to the manager, but he was not even apologetic.

example22.sentence: I am so happy to have a wonderful Italian restaurant in my neighborhood.

example23.sentence: The wine list is wonderful and the food reminds me of my recent trip to Italy.

example25.sentence: – I will never forget the amazing meal, service, and ambiance I experience at this restaurant.

example27.sentence: I have not a bad thing to say about this place.

example30.sentence: I had the Kafta plate and it was perfect.

example31.sentence: Finally a meal that you will remember for a long time!

example32.sentence: – In a age of incremental cost cutting in restaurants, its nice to see a place that bucks that trend, and just plain delivers high quality food and good service, period.

example33.sentence: This is the place to relax and enjoy the finest quality food the industry can offer.

example34.sentence: Caution - its real food for people who love the best.

example35.sentence: I liked the atmosphere very much but the food was not worth the price.

example36.sentence: I may not be a sushi guru but I can tell you that the food here is just okay and that there is not much else to it.

example37.sentence: Rice is too dry, tuna wasn't so fresh either.

example38.sentence: I have eaten here three times and have found the quality and variety of the fish to be excellent.

example39.sentence: However, the value and service are both severely lacking.

example40.sentence: Furthermore, while the fish is unquestionably fresh, rolls tend to be inexplicably bland.

example41.sentence: The service ranges from mediocre to offensive.

example42.sentence: On a recent trip, our waiter was extremely dismissive, while no less than three staff members waited hand-and-foot on a pair of Japanese girls seated nearby.

example43.sentence: Freshest sushi  – I love this restaurant.

example44.sentence: They pay such detail to everything from miso soup to complex rolls.

example45.sentence: The sashimi was the freshest and most tender I have ever tasted.

example54.sentence: the food was great, the margaritas too but the waitress was too busy being nice to her other larger party than to take better care of my friend and me.

example60.sentence: A perfect place to take out of town guests any time of the year.

example61.sentence: Endless fun, awesome music, great staff!!!

example90.sentence: The chana masala (garbanzo beans) are also excellent.

example91.sentence: It's located in a strip mall near the Beverly Center, not the greatest location, but the food keeps me coming back for more.

example93.sentence: I think I have probably tried each item on their menu at least once it is all excellent.

example94.sentence: I can highly recommend their various saag and paneer and korma.

example107.sentence: i am never disappointed with there food.

example112.sentence: Everything I've had here is good, taco salads, burritos, enchiladas i love this place.

example115.sentence: – I've been to Open Sesame only once, but I'm still reeling from the experience!!

example117.sentence: The presentation of the food was an added bonus, it looked just as great as it tasted!

example118.sentence: My best friend had the chicken shawarma and she STILL raves about it being the best anywhere!

example119.sentence: The staff are friendly and the decor was ethic and colorful.

example122.sentence: – The food is here is incredible, though the quality is inconsistent during lunch.

example123.sentence: Dinners have always been excellent, in terms of food quality.

example124.sentence: The open sesame combo plate is a bargain for the heap of food given.

example125.sentence: The side of potatoes is to die for, as is the labne (yogurt dip).

example126.sentence: Also, they serve THE best hummus in America, with a drizzle of fragrant olive oil (which, I believe is the traditional way)!

example127.sentence: The only drawback is the crowded seating and the slow service.

example128.sentence: However, this place is a gem, and I won't stop going back.

example130.sentence: – My first time to dine at this restaurant was with my son and it was absolutely horrible!

example132.sentence: The band was very good and the service was attentive.

example134.sentence: We have since returned and also had a great experience, sampling more small plates and a variety of the beer ( cold and good).

example135.sentence: We did have the same waiter the second time, so maybe the service is spotty and our luck is good.

example136.sentence: Sunday afternoons there is a band playing and it is lots of fun.

example138.sentence: – Ray's (suprisingly) has the city's BEST & most diverse wine list.

example139.sentence: The sommelier is fantastic, down-to-earth, & extremely knowlegable.

example140.sentence: I would go back for the wine experience alone.

example141.sentence: NOT THE PLACE IT ONCE WAS

example142.sentence: – It is sad to see a place that was once "THE" place to meet and eat for Bfast or Lunch, now be the place that is a big "DONT BOTHER."

example143.sentence: The food is not what it once was (potions have seriously seen downsizing) prices have gone up, and the service is the worst I have experienced anywhere (including mainland Europe).

example144.sentence: What may be interesting to most is the worst sevice/attitude comes from the owners of this establishment.

example145.sentence: This establishment really made a marked decline after ( and this is recurring story ) the airing of FOOD TELEVISIONS "DINERS, DRIVE-INS, AND DIVES" hosted by Guy Fieri, in which Schooner or Later was subject of.

example146.sentence: Perhaps now, Scooner or Later falls into the "Dive" category.

example147.sentence: I hope one day Scooner or Later returns to what it once was.

example148.sentence: Open & Cool Place with the Best Pizza and Coffee

example149.sentence: – Mioposto has a very creative & delicious pizza menu.

example150.sentence: The coffe is very good, too.

example152.sentence: This place is charming and relaxing.

example153.sentence: The servers behind the counter are always friendly and helpful.

example154.sentence: It's a great place to enjoy food and meet friends.

example155.sentence: – After 12 years in Seattle Ray's rates as the place we always go back to.

example156.sentence: Great food, spectacular location, and friendly service keep us coming back year after year.

example159.sentence: I had the kafta plate and I enjoyed it.

example162.sentence: Still I would recommend this place.

example163.sentence: WHAT ELSE CAN YOU SAY NICE PEOPLE AMAZING FOOD WOW

example166.sentence: The best place for a leisure Sunday breakfast amidst yachts, then take a stroll through the nearby Farmer's Market.

example172.sentence: Be sure to try the oyster roll.

example173.sentence: – How to describe the best sushi in NYC: hmmmm, delicious, amazing, fantastic, suculent, perfect, nah, all of the above.

example174.sentence: I can't saybenough good things about this restaurant, and I can't wait for my next several visits.

example175.sentence: The best Chuwam Mushi I have ever had.

example177.sentence: One of the best Sushi place in town.

example178.sentence: The house special roll is really good.

example182.sentence: It's the perfect spot for a romantic date for 2 or a secret rendezvous!

example191.sentence: Space was limited, but the food made up for it.

example192.sentence: Well I guess it's hard to be seated when one is invisible to the staff.

example193.sentence: We stood there for 10 minutes while employees walked back and forth ignoring us.

example194.sentence: Finally, my wife stood face to face in front of one of the staff and she asked, "Are you waiting for a table?"

example195.sentence: The Caesar salad I ordered had so much lemon I couldn't eat it.
